mapper.sql: sid, props_sid, props_name, is_key_prop, is_enum_prop, props_desc, props_code, status, sort_order, channel_sid, is_erp_prop, erp_type, erp_prop_code, create_time, opt_user_sid
mapper.insert: insert into pcm_category_props_dict (sid, props_sid, props_name, is_key_prop, is_enum_prop, props_desc, props_code, status, sort_order, channel_sid, is_erp_prop, erp_type, erp_prop_code, create_time, opt_user_sid ) values (#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{propsSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{propsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isKeyProp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isEnumProp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{propsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sortOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isErpProp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{erpType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{erpPropCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{optUserSid,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

mapper.update:
update pcm_category_props_dict
props_sid = #{propsSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
props_name = #{propsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_key_prop = #{isKeyProp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_enum_prop = #{isEnumProp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
props_desc = #{propsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
props_code = #{propsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT},
channel_sid = #{channelSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_erp_prop = #{isErpProp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
erp_type = #{erpType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
erp_prop_code = #{erpPropCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
opt_user_sid = #{optUserSid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pcm_category_props_dict set props_sid = #{propsSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, props_name = #{propsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_key_prop = #{isKeyProp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_enum_prop = #{isEnumProp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, props_desc = #{propsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, props_code = #{propsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=BIGINT}, channel_sid = #{channelSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_erp_prop = #{isErpProp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, erp_type = #{erpType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, erp_prop_code = #{erpPropCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, opt_user_sid = #{optUserSid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT pcpd.* from pcm_category_props_dict AS pcpd INNER JOIN pcm_category_prop_values AS pcpv ON pcpd.props_sid=pcpv.props_sid INNER JOIN pcm_category as pc ON pcpv.category_sid=pc.category_sid WHERE pc.parent_sid=#{parentSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT count(sid) from pcm_category_props_dict AS pcpd INNER JOIN pcm_category_prop_values AS pcpv ON pcpd.props_sid=pcpv.props_sid INNER JOIN pcm_category as pc ON pcpv.category_sid=pc.category_sid WHERE pc.parent_sid=#{parentSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT pcpd.sid as sid, pcpd.props_sid as propsSid, pcpd.props_name as propsName, pcpd.is_enum_prop as isEnumProp, pcpv.not_null as notNull from pcm_category_props_dict as pcpd INNER JOIN pcm_category_prop_values as pcpv ON pcpd.props_sid=pcpv.props_sid INNER JOIN pcm_category AS pct ON pcpv.category_sid=pct.sid where pct.is_leaf='Y' and pct.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT DISTINCT pcpd.sid as sid, pcpd.props_sid as propsSid, pcpd.props_name as propsName, pcpd.is_enum_prop as isEnumProp, pcpv.not_null as notNull from pcm_category_props_dict as pcpd INNER JOIN pcm_category_prop_values as pcpv ON pcpd.props_sid=pcpv.props_sid INNER JOIN pcm_category AS pct ON pcpv.category_sid=pct.sid where pct.is_leaf='Y' and pct.sid in ( select sid from pcm_category where category_type=3 and is_leaf = 'Y' order by sort_order asc )

SELECT count(sid) from pcm_category_props_dict as pcpd INNER JOIN pcm_category_prop_values as pcpv ON pcpd.props_sid=pcpv.props_sid INNER JOIN pcm_category AS pct ON pcpv.category_sid=pct.sid WHERE pct.is_leaf='Y' and pct.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
